name: Penguins of Madagascar
description:
Help Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private defeat Dr. Octavius Brine’s
plan for world domination!

Game Features :

Go on stealth operations in top-secret locations from the movie and
beyond.

Master each Penguin’s unique skill, like Rico’s Explosive Slide and
Skipper’s Stun Slap.

Solve puzzles, crack codes and hunt for Cheezy Dibbles!
